title: @any rioter, looking for a song!

embed.description: SK telecom T1 vs. G2 Esports TSM vs. Flash Wolves Team WE vs. GIGABYTE Marines TSM vs. G2 Esports Flash Wolves vs. GIGABYTE Marines SK telecom T1 vs. Team WE Welcome to the 2017 Mid-Season Invitational!

body:
The song starts playing at 8h 27m 44s, the link should take you there.
I know it was also being used for highlights in NA LCS, I just can't find it anywhere. There are a lot of NA LCS music playlists, even a MSI one but it's not on these lists.
I have even asked support, but they said to look around for it on the boards, so here I am. Hope somebody can help me find this great song.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Assuming that youtube link in fact took me to the right spot, the song you're looking for is the 2015 MSI Theme. You can find it at the link below:

[2015 MSI Theme](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/msi-theme-2015)

I'll make sure this track is included in the 2017 MSI Music List when it goes live.
Thank you so much! OP here just posting from a different account.

> I'll make sure this track is included in the 2017 MSI Music List when it goes live.

Hi SwampWTFox. Do you work for the eSports or the Live Broadcast Team? If so, can you please get Mark Z's version of Silver Scrapes included in the playlist as well?
